title: Werner Roth (footballer)
text:
Werner Roth (25 July 1925 – 25 March 2011) was a German <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and manager.
Roth played as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> for <a href="VfB%20M%C3%BChlburg">VfB Mühlburg</a> between 1948 and 1952. He remained with the club following Muhlburg's merger with "Karlsruher FC Phönix" and played for newly formed <a href="Karlsruher%20SC">Karlsruher SC</a> until 1959, appearing 156 times and scoring 10 goals in the <a href="Oberliga%20S%C3%BCd%20%281945%E2%80%9363%29">Oberliga Süd</a>. He also coached the club in the <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> from 19 October 1965 until 1 November 1966.
